thread.title: Twitter Reacts To Kevin Owens' Betrayal Of Chris Jericho
thread.title_full: Twitter Reacts To Kevin Owens' Betrayal Of Chris Jericho

author: Brandon Gnetz
title: Twitter Reacts To Kevin Owens' Betrayal Of Chris Jericho
text:
Twitter Reacts To Kevin Owens' Betrayal Of Chris Jericho Brandon Gnetz Start Slideshow Slide of 
Showgirls, fringe, glitter and magic. Chris Jericho 's Festival of Friendship lived up to the hype as one of the best segments on RAW in a long time. Jericho brought out a reluctant Kevin Owens to give him gifts, including an awkward sculpture, a painting, a magician named Friendship and Gillberg. 
Owens was furious with the gifts and the jokes, but Jericho then dropped the comedic act and told KO how much he appreciated working with him over the past year. Jericho then assured Owens that he would have his back at Fastlane against Goldberg. 
That's when Owens gave Jericho the List of KO, which only included one name: Chris Jericho. As soon as Jericho began to understand what was going on, Owens attacked, powerbombing Y2J into the apron and slamming his head into the television monitor. 
Here is how Twitter reacted to one of the heartbreaking end to one of the most entertaining pairings in WWE History.
